name: Great Wyrm Green Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: A gargantuan green dragon with a masterful command of both land and aquatic environments, characterized by its cunning nature and ability to manipulate those around it.
memorable: This dragon excels in stealth and intimidation while utilizing its powerful poison breath and social manipulation abilities.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory and manipulate others to achieve its ends.
relations: Often serves as a master to lesser dragons and could be allied with other evil creatures.
environment: Commonly found in forests, swamps, or near water bodies.
strengths: Immunized against poison and skilled in both combat and manipulation with high damage output and tactical abilities.
weaknesses: Relies on saving throws and has a limited number of powerful abilities.
attacks: Three attacks per turn featuring a bite, claw strikes, and the ability to spit poison.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath, which affects a large area and can reduce poison immunity in its targets.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, a high passive Perception of 23, allowing it to detect intruders effectively.
skills: Proficient in deception, insight, and stealth, enhancing its ability to manipulate and evade.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to ignore failed saving throws.
Possesses the Amphibious trait, enabling it to breathe underwater.
The Woodland Stalker ability grants advantage on stealth checks in forests.
Blood Toxicity punishes melee attackers with poison damage.
Can use powerful spellcasting abilities innately.
spellcasting: Can innately cast various spells including animal messenger, tongues, and mass suggestion.
test_queries: formidable gargantuan green dragon in forests
green dragon that excels in combat and deception
